item.title: Ardupilot Postmortem
item.description: A big thanks to those who helped from the Ardupilot Forum Last week, I took a few extra days off from work to give myself a nice long break over Thanksgiving week. I spent a lot of time finishing an RC plane we had some replacement parts for. This one was going to be autonomous. I spent a few days soldering the flight controller and electronics, gluing the plane together, measuring and trimming everything perfectly.
